verbose_text: Given that the expression of ET-1 and ET-B, but not the other two interesting pairs of ligands and receptors (alphaMSH / MC1R and SCF / KIT), was confirmed to be concomitantly increased in SLs compared to their adjacent sun exposed control areas, it was reasonable to hypothesize that ET-1 signaling plays a substantial role in developing and/or maintaining hyperpigmentation.
